channel.title: Troubleshooting on Kindnet
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Kindnet

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Where are the binary files located in pod started by daemon set? The Kindnet lightweight daemon binary file is located in: /bin/kindnetd The CNI plugin binary file is located in: /opt/cni/bin/cni-kindnet Where is configuration file used by CNI in pod tarted by daemon set? /etc/cni/net.d/10-kindnet.conflist How to check Kindnet logs ? In order to retrieve and follow the logs of the kindnet DaemonSet in the kube-system namespace, use command: kubectl -n kube-system logs ds/kindnet -f If there is a need to debug specific pod running on selected node, check at first pod name:
